publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3864 Patricia Ferguson: A Step Closer to Maryhill and Possilpark’s Town Centre Regeneration—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Minister for Housing and Communities that the Town Centre Regeneration Fund will be open to any area designated in a local authority development plan as a town centre; recognises that both Maryhill and Possilpark hold this designation within the Glasgow city plan, and looks to the Scottish Government to assist partners in these communities to access the funds. Supported by: David Stewart*, Jackie Baillie*, Mr Frank McAveety*

S3M-3864 Patricia Ferguson: A Step Closer to Maryhill and Possilpark’s Town Centre Regeneration—That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Minister for Housing and Communities that the Town Centre Regeneration Fund will be open to any area designated in a local authority development plan as a town centre; recognises that both Maryhill and Possilpark hold this designation within the Glasgow city plan, and looks to the Scottish Government to assist partners in these communities to access the funds. Supported by: David Stewart, Jackie Baillie, Mr Frank McAveety, Pauline McNeill*, Bill Butler*
S3M-3864 A Step Closer to Maryhill and Possilpark’s Town Centre Regeneration (lodged on 2 April 2009) Sandra White*
